post:
Hello again LET :)
 
At [VPN.sh](http://www.vpn.sh) we pride ourselves on keeping you secure online. We have a total of **25 locations**, and all accounts with us get access to all of the locations. Any new locations that we add will automatically be added to your account for you to access.
 
We've got some new locations at the moment, so here we have an exclusive offer for LowEndTalk users!
 
Get **250GB worth of data per year (note, this bandwidth is yearly, not monthly)**, at a total cost of just **£3 per year!** (converts to $4.93).

---
 
>**Locations:**

>**250GB bandwidth per year across 25 locations**

> **VPN Features**

>* PPTP

>* Only your bandwidth usage is logged, so to keep users on the right packages
>* Ability to use on multiple devices (Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android and more)
>* We accept PayPal and Bitcoin

---

**£3 ($4.93) yearly recurring - [Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=25)**

---

Quite a few LET regulars use our service, and we're only hearing positive comments! Our VPN service really does undercut the majority of the market in terms of cost, especially in offers such as this, however we don't sacrifice performance and you should see some solid network speeds through our system!
